column5: Look at this ad that just popped up.  Kick a man while he's down.  http://www.kijiji.ca/v-powerboat-motorboat/oshawa-durham-region/aluminum-boat-with-two-motors/1176550756?enableSearchNavigationFlag=true  Maybe you have seen the boat.  Cheers, Mark

How long did it take this guy to return??????? You don't just drive up the highway, see a boat and motors laying on the road/side of the road and pop it on an empty trailer you just happened to be towing all within a couple of minutes. Something strange about this one!
how do you NOT realise your boat has come off the trailer ??

Yeah, saw this last night as well. He thinks his strap was cut off, and the people who cut it followed until the boat came off. Pretty crazy! I don't know how he didn't notice it gone though.....small boat behind a big truck maybe? WEird for sure.   S.
seems like a bit of an extreme heist for such an old boat...something is off about this.
Ya, if it came off the trailer while rolling, the motors probably got trashed and not really worth the effort to take it.

Ya, if it came off the trailer while rolling, the motors probably got trashed and not really worth the effort to take it.  That's what I was thinking; it be one beat up, road-rash pile of aluminum.  Dan.
2 motors on a boat that size?   Strange.
Could be an insurance scam. I don't know the guy from Adam, so I'm not saying it is. But something definitely seems off here and stranger things have happened.

Yeah, saw this last night as well. He thinks his strap was cut off, and the people who cut it followed until the boat came off. Pretty crazy! I don't know how he didn't notice it gone though.....small boat behind a big truck maybe? WEird for sure.   S.  That doesn't make much sense.  They would be counting on:   2 motors on a boat that size? Strange.  It's not uncommon for people add a kicker when they have a six as their main motor... more common for six cylinder motors than six horse power motors though
